name: INMediaItemType
desc: The type of content the media item describes.

items.name: case station
items.desc: A media type that indicates a station.

items.name: case radioStation
items.desc: A media type that indicates a radio station.

items.name: case algorithmicRadioStation
items.desc: A media type that indicates related content.

items.name: case album
items.desc: A media type that indicates an album.

items.name: case artist
items.desc: A media type that indicates an artist.

items.name: case musicStation
items.desc: A media type that indicates a music station.

items.name: case musicVideo
items.desc: A media type that indicates a music video.

items.name: case playlist
items.desc: A media type that indicates a playlist of music.

items.name: case song
items.desc: A media type that indicates a song.

items.name: case music
items.desc: A media type that indicates music.

items.name: case movie
items.desc: A media type that indicates a movie.

items.name: case tvShow
items.desc: A media type that indicates a TV show or series.

items.name: case tvShowEpisode
items.desc: A media type that indicates an episode of a TV show or series.

items.name: case podcastEpisode
items.desc: A media type that indicates a podcast episode.

items.name: case podcastPlaylist
items.desc: A media type that indicates a playlist of podcast episodes.

items.name: case podcastShow
items.desc: A media type that indicates a podcast show.

items.name: case podcastStation
items.desc: A media type that indicates a podcast station.

items.name: case audioBook
items.desc: A media type that indicates an audio book.

items.name: case news
items.desc: A media type that indicates news.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: A media type that indicates an unknown type.

items.name: case genre
items.desc: A media type that indicates a genre.
